title: [Griffin's Keen, Protected Lee]
description: While not offering the comforts of a well-stoked hearth and a brimming pantry, this secluded spot inside Onyx Point is a welcome relief from the noise and cold of the mountainside.  A ring of char-streaked stones marks where travelers before you have managed to scrape together a fire.  A pearly thread of moonlight filters down from a hole in the high ceiling.

While not offering the comforts of a well-stoked hearth and a brimming pantry, this secluded spot inside Onyx Point is a welcome relief from the noise and cold of the mountainside.  A ring of char-streaked stones marks where travelers before you have managed to scrape together a fire.  A thin ray of sunlight filters down from a hole in the high ceiling.
